channel.title: Starter (508)
channel.description:
hey can anyone help me with changing the starter that u get in te begining of my server i completely forgot (3 months absent) like iwold lik t add armor and food and some weapons... plese dont flame i havent coded for 3 months also if u could tell me how i can fix my ::ban because i can ban the user but it doesent log them out and how to add ::ipban and ::mute and ::ipmute also how do i change the writing that happens wen u log in like welcometo blahscap how can i change that thanks :)
again please dont flame havent coded in forever :P
